H0.text: When David killed Goliath, how many of his five stones did he use. 05

H1.text: When David killed Goliath, how many of his five stones did he use. 02

H2.text: When David killed Goliath, how many of his five stones did he use. 03

H3.text: When David killed Goliath, how many of his five stones did he use. 01

A4.text: David hurls a stone from his sling and hits Goliath in the center of his forehead.

A5.text: David takes only his staff, sling, and five stones from a brook.
